content: *celebrate halloween with some crochet this bewitching finger puppet is as delightful as it is ghastly featured in bk4k lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80770ad published in by kids for kids skill level easy + microspun article #910 2 colors 1 ball each *shown in ebony & lime* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm small amount polyester fiberfill worked in rounds
